saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib

Class BleTrackerPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.BleTrackerPreferences

  • public class BleTrackerPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Within this class you can specify your preferences how the lib should work. Be aware that lib will stop sending to CISPA if your data quality is too bad. the affecting params are location freshness and location accuracy
